author: ehu
msg: ra_local cancellation support.
* subversion/include/svn_io.h
* subversion/libsvn_subr/stream.c
(svn_stream_copy2): New. Takes an extra cancellation function argument.
(svn_stream_copy): Now deprecated. Forwards call to svn_stream_copy2().
* subversion/libsvn_ra_local/ra_plugin.c
(make_reporter): Wrap the passed in editor with a cancellation editor
iff a cancellation function is provided in the callbacks.
(log_baton,
cancellation_log_receiver): New. Function/baton pair to wrap the
receiver argument passed to svn_ra_local__get_logs().
(svn_ra_local__get_log): Wrap the receiver function iff a cancellation
function is provided in the callbacks.
(svn_ra_local__get_file): Use svn_stream_copy2 with a cancellation function
argument iff callbacks have been provided in the session.

author: dlr
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r22329.

author: dlr
msg: Report the first error found when parsing rule values from an authz
file, rather than the last.  This both returns a more useful error,
and doesn't leak a bunch of errors in the middle.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/authz.c
(authz_validate_rule): Return after creating an error.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/authz_tests.py
(broken_authz_file): Test for comment text in authz rule values.
While functionally this isn't really a change, it's likely a more
common case as found in the wild.
Patch by: glasser
me
Found by: Mats Fors <mats.fors@iar.se>

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r22327, adding usage documentation for the --url
option.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py
(usage): Add usage for --url.

author: dlr
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py
(usage): New function which prints usage information for a test
program.
(run_tests): Remove incomplete usage information from header doc.
Add support for --help/-h, invoking usage() and exiting if
specified.
